scripts.start: npm run start:storybook && npm run logs
scripts.start:all: npm run start:storybook && npm run start:sandbox && npm run logs
scripts.start:storybook: BRANCH_NAME=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) docker compose up --build -d fudis-storybook
scripts.build: docker build -t fudis:latest ./ngx-fudis && docker cp $(docker create fudis:latest):/usr/src/app/dist ./ngx-fudis/dist
scripts.postversion: git commit --amend -m "Bump to version v$npm_package_version" && git push && git push origin v$npm_package_version
